NOTE Refer to ISO 9001:2015 for information and requirements to establish a Quality Management System. a) Plan quality management. This activity consists of the following tasks: 1) Establish quality management policies, objectives, and procedures. NOTE 1 ISO 9004:2009 contains guidelines for performance improvements.
